name: Beaver Run 3D Endless Runner
description:
Run Beaver Run! Keep the Beaver Safe from the hunter.

ZIG and ZAG your way through the forest to keep Stanley safe from the hunter.


-Swipe Controls
-Jump and Slide through the forest!
-Collect Gems
-Missions
-Achievements
-Power Ups: Magnetism, Ghost Beaver(Run through obstacles)

The newest runner from Re:Creative Studios.
